label: Temperature
info: Designed for a single vessel eBIAB

label: Pump
info: Pump control for recirculating mash and transfer

label: Mash Controls
info: Modified from [brew2 by Justin Angevaare](https://github.com/jangevaare/brew2) to fit my eBIAB setup.

label: Boil Controls
info: Modified from [brew2 by Justin Angevaare](https://github.com/jangevaare/brew2) to fit my eBIAB setup.

label: PID outputs
info: Modified from [brew2 by Justin Angevaare](https://github.com/jangevaare/brew2) to fit my eBIAB setup.

label: BeerXML Importer
info: Import data from BeerXML, i.e. exported from Beersmith.  Currently will not work properly if the beer is setup as an extract recipe.

Theme
format:
<style>
:root {
  --color-base: #2E3440;
  --color-text-primary: #E5E9F0;
  --color-widget-border: #434C5E;
  --color-background: #3B4252;
  --color-widget-background: #4C566A;
  --color-track-fill: #5E81AC;
  --color-active-tab: #81A1C1;
}

body.nr-dashboard-theme, body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
    background-color: var(--color-base);
    color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
    background-color: var(--color-background);
    color: var(--color-text-primary);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-widget-border);
}

.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
    text-align: center;
    color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
    background-color: var(--color-background);
    color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
    color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

.nr-menu-item-active div button {
    border-right: 4px solid var(--color-active-tab);
}

.ui_upload p.title, p.result {
    color: var(--color-text-primary) !important;
    background-color: var(--color-background) !important;
}

/* Track fill color */
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-track-fill {
    background-color: var(--color-track-fill) !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-focus-ring {
    background-color: var(--color-track-fill) !important;
}

/* Sets the size of the timer font */
#Brewery_Controls_Timer_cards {
    font-size: 50px !important;
    /*color: var(--color-text-primary) !important;*/
}

</style>
